nodes.text: The Falko system was a star system located in the Outer Rim Territories' sector known as the Centrality. The system shared its name with the Falko Run hyperlane, which connected it to the Antipose system and the world Uaua.
The Falko system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square U-8.
